src:
Anjlok, Kedatangan Belasan KA Alami Keterlambatan di Stasiun Madiun
06 Nov 2019, 11:35 by Eka Wulan


Anjlok, Kedatangan Belasan KA Alami Keterlambatan di Stasiun Madiun

KBRN, Madiun : Kedatangan belasan kereta api (KA) mengalami keterlambatan di Stasiun Besar Madiun, Rabu (6/11/2019). Hal itu sebagai salah satu dampak anjloknya KA 7091C Wijayakusuma relasi Surabaya Gubeng-Cilacap di emplasemen Stasiun Barat pada Selasa (5/11/2019) malam.Manager Humas PT KAI Daop 7 Madiun, Ixfan Hendriwintoko mengatakan, keterlambatan kedatangan KA di stasiun Madiun rata-rata lebih dua jam. Kemungkinan, keterlambatan masih terus berlangsung hingga beberapa jam kedepan."Ada sekitar 13 kereta api yang mengalami kelambatan. Kami sampaikan permohonan maaf kepada para pelanggan karena akibat kelambatan sehingga pelayanannya kurang nyaman," kata Ixfan, Rabu (6/11/2019).Adapun 13 KA yang mengalami keterlambatan yakni KA Singasari, KA Molek, KA Jayakarta, KA Bangunkarta, KA Malabar, KA Matarmaja. Kemudian KA Bima, KA Mutiara Selatan, KA Gajayana, KA Brantas. Selanjutnya KA Majapahit, KA Kahuripan dan KA Turangga.Bagi para pelanggan yang akan membatalkan tiket perjalananya, PT KAI akan mengembalikan biaya 100%. Kemudian pada KA yang terlambat lebih 3 jam, PT KAI Daop 7 memberikan service recovery atau pemulihan layanan. Untuk meminimalisasi komplain pelanggan, bagi pengguna jasa KA yang sudah memiliki tiket utamanya tujuan Surabaya dialihkan ke KA lain yang berada di belakangnya yang tidak terganggu.Menurut Ixfan, ada 50 penumpang yang telah dialihkan ke KA yang lain. Hingga saat ini, belum diketahui penyebab anjloknya KA Wijayakusuma karena masih dilakukan pengusutan oleh tim internal KAI maupun Kementerian Perhubungan di lokasi kejadian.Ixfan menjelaskan, saat ini posisi kereta yang anjlok sudah terangkat. Evakuasi berlangsung selama enam jam menggunakan alat berat (crane). Saat ini jalur sudah bisa dilalui namun kecepatannya terbatas untuk penyempurnaan lebih lanjut."Kecepatannya 10 km/jam di titik kejadian, karena mungkin ada beberapa titik yang terganggu akibat lepasnya roda sehingga letak posisi rel dikhawatirkan geometrinya tidak sejajar," kata dia.Seperti diketahui, anjloknya KA Wijayakusuma mengakibatkan dua gerbong mengalami kerusakan. Yakni gerbong kelas ekonomi dan satu kereta pembangkit. Beruntung tidak ada korban jiwa akibat insiden tersebut.
text:
Plummeted, Arrivals of dozens of trains have experienced delays at Madiun Station
Nov 6 2019, 11:35 by Eka Wulan


Plummeted, Arrivals of dozens of trains have experienced delays at Madiun Station

KBRN, Madiun: The arrival of dozens of trains (KA) has been delayed at the Great Madiun Station, Wednesday (11/06/2019). That was one of the impacts of the drop in the railroad of Surabaya Gubeng-Cilacap Wijayakusuma 7091C railroad at the West Station emplacement on Tuesday (11/5/2019) night. Public Relations Manager of PT KAI Daop 7 Madiun, Ixfan Hendriwintoko said, the late arrival of the train at the Madiun station was average average more than two hours. Possibly, the delay still continues until the next few hours. "There are about 13 trains that are experiencing delays. We convey our apologies to customers because of the delay so that the service is less comfortable," said Ixfan, Wednesday (11/06/2019). 13 trains that experienced delays were Singasari train, Molek train, Jayakarta train, Bangunkarta train, Malabar train, Matarmaja train. Then Bima train, Mutiara Selatan train, Gajayana train, Brantas train. Furthermore Majapahit train, Kahuripan train and Turangga train. For customers who will cancel their travel tickets, PT KAI will refund 100% of the fee. Then on trains that are more than 3 hours late, PT KAI Daop 7 provides service recovery. To minimize customer complaints, train service users who already have their main ticket to Surabaya are diverted to another train that is not interrupted behind them. According to Ixfan, there are 50 passengers who have been diverted to other trains. Until now, the cause of the Wijayakusuma train drop has not yet been known because it is still being investigated by KAI's internal team and the Ministry of Transportation at the scene. Alexfan explained, at this time the train's position had dropped. Evacuation lasts for six hours using heavy equipment (crane). Currently the path can be traversed but the speed is limited for further refinement. "The speed is 10 km / h at the point of occurrence, because there may be some points that are disrupted due to the release of the wheels so the position of the rail position is feared that the geometry is not aligned," he said. the collapse of the Wijayakusuma Railway caused two train cars to be damaged. Namely economy-class carriages and one power train. Luckily there were no casualties due to the incident.
